dtliExcerpt: Hawkins and Abdul-Mateen II bring a compelling intensity to their sibling rivalry, making Suzan-Lori Parks' Pulitzer Prize-winning drama feel urgent and immediate.
bwwExcerpt: Make no mistake: After an evening on Broadway with Corey Hawkins, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II and the electrifying theatrical crossfire of "Topdog/Underdog," you'll never again think of three-card monte as a mere money-grubbing street hustle....
showScoreExcerpt: Hawkins and Abdul-Mateen II bring a compelling intensity to their sibling rivalry, making Suzan-Lori Parks' Pulitzer Prize-winning drama feel urgent and immediate.
